SELECT t.id, t.address, t.avatar, t.description, t.email, t.mobile, t.nick_name AS nickName, t.`password`, t.sex, t.`status`, t.type, t.username AS userName, t.del_flag AS delFlag, t.department_id AS departmentId, t.street, t.pass_strength AS passStrength, t.update_time AS updateTime, t.create_by AS createBy, date_format( t.create_time, '%Y-%c-%d %h:%i:%s' ) AS createTime, t.update_by AS updateBy FROM sys_user AS t LEFT JOIN sys_department AS tt ON t.department_id=tt.id
AND t.`username` LIKE CONCAT(#{dto.userName}"%")
AND tt.attach_code LIKE CONCAT(#{code}"%")
AND t.`status` = #{dto.status}
